text:
is it possible to make the custom module design previewer not refresh the entire screen when you make a change, but instead refresh just the iframe and the fields?

Just makes it feel sluggish
in-fact I’m finding it tends to refresh like twice every time I make a change.

here’s kind of an example of when it’s not really being useful auto refreshing, but honestly kind of a hinderance.
<https://spin.d.pr/VnxwuH+>

All I’m doing is typing out one css property but watching this thing refresh a lot. and once I’m done typing the actual property out, it takes an extra long time because it’s refreshing and detecting it needs to refresh again making it take awhile. not saying kill the auto update thing, that’s really cool. it’d just be nice if it didn’t reload the whole thing every time making it take longer to see our changes than if we just hit a button to do it ourselves
That is 100% not suppose to be happening.
Mind sending me a link to investigate?

In my experience,  the preview will get jumbled up and the tab has to be refreshed or a new preview has to be opened to reset it what ever is tripping it up. Generally though, it work pretty smooth for me out of the gate.
